topics.body:
Personally in the event of any sort of apocalypse I plan to be dead. There may also be screaming like a seven year old girl, crying, and soiling myself before hand.

Realistically even if you are as prepared as you could possibly be this is still the most likely scenario.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/542b6ea363687246f24b0000#post_542b6ea363687246f24b0000

Oh yeah those kinds. 

Well there are plenty of good zombie based genre stories out there, you just need to find them. I'm just going through comics at the moment, classic zombies are best since you avoid all the ridiculous crap that some people put into certain stories. 

Although it would be badass if you can turn into a half-life, half alive half dead person, not a full zombie, though it'd suck for a while.

topics.author: 4fdfbf92945b7075d50036e4

topics.body:
in the event of a zombie apocalypse i plan to kill myself as fast as possible.

1. less painful death, probably jump off a building, get run over by a train, shoot myself in the head.

2.1 less zombie future survivors have to deal with.

3. i plan to leave a note instructing survivors in where they can find my secret stash of food and supplies if i ever make one.
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/542b6ea063687203c6af0100#post_542b6ea063687203c6af0100

Okay nice to know, I'm actually probably not going to do that and just kill myself, just more cleanly. Cyanide or poison is more than enough for me, don't need the trauma of a bullet going through my head.
